thread.title: David Beckham Grabs a Sushi Lunch After Working Up a Sweat
thread.title_full: David Beckham Grabs a Sushi Lunch After Working Up a Sweat

author: Just Jared
title: David Beckham Grabs a Sushi Lunch After Working Up a Sweat
text:
David Beckham puts his tattooed arms on display in a tight green tee while heading into SoulCycle for a morning workout on Tuesday (January 31) in Santa Monica, Calif.
After working up a sweat, the 41-year-old former soccer player cleaned up and changed into a new outfit for his lunch date.
David grabbed a sushi lunch with his best friend Dave Gardner at Nobu in Malibu. He was spotted riding his motorcycle to the hotspot!
David took to his Instagram story page to share pics of his meal and even a peek at the secret menu.
